real_estate.title: Immersive Real Estate 3D
real_estate.subtitle: Explore properties as if you were truly there
real_estate.content: VRPlus enables developers to showcase properties with outstanding realism. From interactive 3D architectural models to panoramic VR tours, everything runs directly in the browser with no installation required. Smart hotspots reveal room details, materials, dimensions, and AI-powered interior suggestions.

tourism.title: 360° Virtual Tourism
tourism.subtitle: Experience destinations with breathtaking panoramic immersion
tourism.content: VRPlus recreates tourist attractions using advanced 360° panorama technology similar to AirPano. Users explore landscapes through immersive viewpoints enhanced by hotspots, descriptions, geographic data, and audio guides. A powerful solution for tourism brands and regional digital transformation projects.

culture.title: Digital Cultural Spaces
culture.subtitle: Preserve and showcase culture through 3D and VR technology
culture.content: VRPlus digitizes cultural heritage using high-resolution 3D models, photogrammetry, and virtual museums. Visitors can inspect artifacts from every angle, enjoy narrated experiences, and interact through informative hotspots. A major step toward cultural digitalization.

education.title: VR Education Solutions
education.subtitle: Interactive learning powered by 3D models and virtual classrooms
education.content: VRPlus delivers immersive learning environments with 3D STEM models, virtual labs, and VR classrooms. WebVR allows students to interact directly with simulations, significantly improving retention. Teachers can create multimedia lessons and track learner progress.

historical_sites.title: Reconstructed Heritage Sites
historical_sites.subtitle: Explore historical landmarks through immersive 3D reconstructions
historical_sites.content: VRPlus restores ancient structures and degraded heritage sites using advanced 3D simulation. Users understand historical context, architectural changes, and time progression through hotspots that reveal archaeological data and related events.

technology.title: VRPlus Technology
technology.subtitle: WebVR, 3D and AI combined into one powerful ecosystem
technology.content: VRPlus leverages WebVR, Three.js, AI-based optimization, and intelligent hotspot management to deliver smooth VR/3D experiences directly in the browser. It supports large 3D models, real-time streaming, physics simulation, and enterprise scalability.

technology.title: Core Technologies of VRPlus
technology.subtitle: Next-generation WebVR • 3D • Panorama Platform
technology.description: VRPlus integrates WebVR, real-time 3D, 360° panoramas and intelligent hotspots to deliver fully interactive virtual experiences directly in the browser.

sections.r3f_engine_desc: Built on Three.js with React Three Fiber, VRPlus enables building 3D scenes with JSX, offering high performance and scalable architecture.
sections.drei_desc: Utilizing Drei helpers such as OrbitControls, Html hotspots, Environment and AdaptiveDpr to accelerate 3D development and improve visual quality.
sections.panorama_desc: High-resolution multi-scene panorama tours with interactive hotspots, scene transitions, info panels and 3D model linking.
sections.hotspot_system_desc: Supports 2D & 3D hotspots: scene switching, camera navigation, annotations, model linking and interactive content inside the virtual environment.
sections.camera_control_desc: Admin tools allow capturing camera position, orientation and creating smooth camera animation paths for guided 3D storytelling.
sections.cloud_streaming_desc: Load and render high-poly GLB/GLTF models directly from the server using optimized Three.js + R3F pipelines.
sections.ai_integration_desc: AI analyzes 3D scenes and panoramas to auto-generate descriptions, suggest hotspot positions and assist with guided narration.
sections.spatial_audio_desc: Immersive 3D audio and voice narration bring environments to life and enhance presence in VR.
sections.multi_device_desc: Fully compatible with PC, mobile and VR headsets through —no installation required.
sections.realtime_sync_desc: An architecture ready for multi-user scenarios: shared viewing, interactions and synchronized camera states.
